text: Christopher Rankin (1788 â€“ March 14, 1826) was an attorney and politician from Pennsylvania. He moved to the Mississippi Territory in 1809. He was a delegate to the state constitutional convention in 1817, and was later elected as a U.S. representative for several terms, serving from 1819 to 1826. title: Christopher Rankin
